Name: Not so Cosmo
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This non-alcoholic cocktail may look like a Cosmo but sadly, it doesn't taste like one. Cosmopolitan cocktail history
History: Discovered in 2003 at Claridge's Bar in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Not so Cosmo contains 45 calories
